text:
@seiff @jimmysong @Bitcoin > Printing money doesn‚Äôt require someone to buy it.

It actually does. "Buy" of course meaning "accept in exchange for products" in that context. And we've certainly seen cases where money quickly becomes worthless because people stop thinking it's a good place to keep value!
